snippet: With technology’s rapid change, even recent new-music works struggle to duplicate electronic effects of scant decades ago.
abstract: Rapid changes in technology are challenging electronic musicians to be innovative in how they preserve sounds and perform works, some of which are only a decade old.
lead_paragraph: With technology’s rapid change, even recent new-music works struggle to duplicate electronic effects of scant decades ago.

headline.seo: New-Music Works With Surprising Problem: Dated Instruments
headline.main: Electronic Woe: The Short Lives of Instruments
headline.print_headline: Electronic Woe: The Short Lives Of Instruments

keywords.value: Kauffman Center for the Performing Arts
